meanings.definition: A man who has lost his spouse by death.
meanings.sent1: After his wife passed away, he joined a support group for widowers.
meanings.sent2: The widowers gathered at the park to share memories of their late wives.
meanings.sent3: The widowers joked about their cooking skills being rusty since their wives were no longer around.
meanings.sent4: The widowers' hearts were like empty houses, missing the warmth of their beloved spouses.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lonely widowers sitting on the bench was a poignant reminder of loss.
